linearState.title: Search performance degradation
linearState.description: Search queries are taking too long. Need to investigate and optimize.

updateData.description:
Search queries are taking too long. Need to investigate and optimize.

**Progress update (2025-01-21):**
- Root cause identified: N+1 query in results aggregation
- Fix ready for review
- Initial tests show 3x faster response times
- Expected to merge by end of day

operations.reasoning: Tom provided a progress update on the search performance issue. The existing issue should be updated with the new findings and timeline.
